name: Kingston House B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful time staying at the Kingston. The owners Harry and Marlie (spelling?) were gracious and friendly and their dog Digby is totally lovable (and will play catch as long you can stand it). There is Internet service and an endless pool you can use. The other guests there were very friendly, and we had nice morning and evening conversations. It is about a ten minute walk to town; we bought 4 day bus/ferry passes and used them to get everywhere.
reviews.title: Staying at the Kingston made our trip to Bermuda special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I just came back from my vacation with my friend. We had a great time. The rooms are cozy, clean and beds are made every day. We had a flatscreen tv (+dvd), bathroom, hairdryer! There is a computer and fridge for everyone to use. they also have a dog and swimming pool.The house owners are so nice and made us feel really comfortable and welcome. Breakfast was delicious, fresh fruits, joghurt, cereals, pastries! You could always ask Harry and his wife for advice or they tell you stories - great!
reviews.title: Best choice - incredible

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's like a 5-10 minute walk into town. Get a bus ticket so you can see as many beaches and tourist attractions as we did! We just stayed for 5 days but had the best time ever!
reviews.title: The best B&B experiences we've ever had!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hosts (Marlie, Harry & Digby) go out of their way to be hospitable. They greet you each morning with a smile and interesting discussions. Each day they gave us wonderful advice on how to enjoy our time to the fullest. Our trip to Bermuda wouldn't have been as memorable if we stayed anywhere else. We hope to be back and bring friends along with us.
reviews.title: We love Bermuda

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: Scott & Kelly
reviews.title: Rude owner

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Marlie and Harry provide great information on all the activities and locations on Bermuda. This is a great way to get oriented to all the island has to offer. We stayed here for four nights in the Frangipani Room. The room has a queen bed and a private bath with a tub/shower and toilet. The sink is in the room. There is desk, bed and armoire. There aren't any windows that look out on anything. In the bath there is a towel warmer/drier. There is a room air conditioner to keep the room cool and dry at night. The bed was very comfortable. There is a hair dryer. All the amenities of a decent hotel. We also enjoyed the endless pool for swimming. There is ample common space and there is wireless internet available. The walk from Hamilton is not far (about 1/2 mile), but it is uphill and the roads in Bermuda are very narrow and twisty. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: gracious hosts provide inside info on island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the second visit to Kingston House where comfort and a relaxed atmosphere are guaranteed by Harry and Marlie. Spotlessly clean, comfortable and great breakfasts all add up to a great value stay, within easy walking distance of Hamilton. Easy access to the pool and sitting areas with the ability to make a range of teas means that it feels just like home. Like last year, our fellow guests made good company at breakfast. Absolutely no hesitation in recommending Kingston House and there is no doubt why it is No1 on Trip Advisor.
reviews.title: You won't be disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife, 22 year old daughter and I spent 5 nights in mid-April at Kingston House, an 8 minute walk to Hamilton.
reviews.title: we will be back!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Engaging hosts Marlie and Harry [and extremely happy dog Digby] made our stay very enjoyable. They provided great information and conversation, They really were interested in making our stay special and treated us like friends. Our delicious breakfasts were memorable as we shared our adventures with very friendly guests [of course we now have each other's email addresses etc] Our daughter made friends with 2 other young ladies staying at Kingston house and had fun at the club scene in Hamilton.
reviews.title: A real home from home - lovely home, great hosts, 5* all the way.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Palmetto suite that had a very nice sitting room with daybed and Queen bed in the other section near our bathroom, We used our large private terrace to sit in the lounges to have a glass of wine and soak up the sun.. Bathroom and large shower were comfortable and very clean. The large downstairs living room and "family "room were inviting, and we had snacks and tea in the late afternoon and got to know the other guests in a very laid-back atmosphere. It does feel like you are staying with friends here!
reviews.title: Just Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The accommodations and breakfasts were marvelous. The knowledge of the hosts made Bermuda come to life as the locals see it. You don't get this in a hotel! The hosts generosity including a ride in the 'green rocket' to visit our son & friend elsewhere on the island made our third trip to Bermuda a 'new' experience. The relaxing 'common areas' that were available to us were much appreciated on our one rainy day in our week. Thanks!
reviews.title: Comfortable, casual accommodations with friendly, enthusiastic hosts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly and knowledgeable hosts, great, generous breakfasts; the best treatment we have ever had in a B&B!
reviews.title: A Home away from Home in Bermuda

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My sister and I were 20 and 22 at the time of our trip. This place is great for young people! It's close to the main strip, it has internet, a pool, great sized rooms... Oh and a free assortment of movies in each room if you're looking to stay in one rainy afternoon.
reviews.title: 5-Star B&B

likes.disliked: — The (short) walk to the main strip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I fell in love with their dog Digby!
reviews.title: Another Good Review of the Kingston House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My parents were concerned with having their two young daughters in an unknown place without security and knowledge of the area. Marlie and Harry provided that safety and gave my parents all of the information they wanted prior to booking . They have daughters around our age, so we really bonded with them during our stay.
reviews.title: Can't wait to return....

likes.disliked: — The mosquitos! But they only liked me, no one else!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fantastic B & B. Harry and Marlie were wonderful and did everything possible to make our stay in Bermuda as pleasant as possible.
reviews.title: Unbeatable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kingston House is a wonderful old house in a great location. The rooms are comfortable and well equipped, the food is great.
reviews.title: Yes, it's that good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: Well I could go on forever about how good it is but it has all been said by previous reviewers....
reviews.title: Feels like home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: JUST GO THERE AND ENJOY IT!!!!!
reviews.title: Amazing home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You’ve read the sterling reviews of the Kingston House and especially Harry and Marlie. Can they really be that good? My wife and I stayed with them from 7/29 – 8/4 and our vote is a resounding YES! This was our first visit to Bermuda. We decided to stay at the Kingston House, based on TripAdvisor reviews, a couple of guide books, and on-line research. Our expectations were high. They were exceeded. Harry and Marlie are knowledgeable, friendly, and genuinely care about their guests. We had many interesting conversations on topics ranging from A to Z. The Kingston House is definitely on our list of places to stay again.
reviews.title: The best place to stay in Bermuda

likes.liked: — The friendliness, cleanliness and value for money

description: Kingston House B&B is conveniently located walking distance to Hamilton and all it's amenities. It has plenty of architectural character and charm as well as the modern conveniences travellers expect in a top hotel. Friendly hosts help you make the most of your time in Bermuda.
